title: Degree Apprenticeship Quality Assurance and Regulatory Management Practicum

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of apprenticeship system structures, experience in educational institution management, or career in education policy
context.additional_context: As practicing professionals, there is a need to strengthen competencies in designing quality management systems applicable to real work environments.

learning_goals: Explain the changes in the UK's degree apprenticeship regulatory framework by categorizing them into three or more stages
Analyze various stakeholder reports (policy documents, audit reports, etc.) to derive core elements of quality assurance
Propose two or more practical strategies for improving domestic degree apprenticeship systems through international case comparisons

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
